metadata.title: CVE-2017-17433 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The recv_files function in receiver.c in the daemon in rsync 3.1.2, and3.1.3-development before 2017-12-03, proceeds with certain file metadataupdates before checking for a filename in the daemon_filter_list datastructure, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended accessrestrictions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17433` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rsync - 3.1.0-2ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rsync package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.0-2ubuntu0.3').
